content.content: 72 Omitted (provides for amendments to this Act). Part VIII (OMITTED) 73 Repealed: 2020, c. 14, Sched. 5, s. 33 (8). Section Amendments with date in force (d/m/y) 2020, c. 14, Sched. 5, s. 33 (8) - 14/07/2020 74-79 Omitted (amends, repeals or revokes other legislation). Part IX (OMITTED) 80 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2017, c. 33, Sched. 2, s. 80; 2020, c. 14, Sched. 5, s. 33 (8). content.raw_html:
72 Omitted (provides for amendments to this Act).

Part VIII (OMITTED)

73 Repealed: 2020, c. 14, Sched. 5, s. 33 (8).

Section Amendments with date in force (d/m/y)

2020, c. 14, Sched. 5, s. 33 (8) - 14/07/2020

74-79 Omitted (amends, repeals or revokes other legislation).

Part IX (OMITTED)

80 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2017, c. 33, Sched. 2, s. 80; 2020, c. 14, Sched. 5, s. 33 (8).

Section Amendments with date in force (d/m/y)

2020, c. 14, Sched. 5, s. 33 (8) - 14/07/2020

81 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

______________
